name: Cardomancer
description:
In this game you play as a Cardomancer. This is a Mage who can only use magical cards to attack.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

E: Pull cards from your deck

Esc: Pause menu

1,2,3,4: Prepare selected card from hand

Left mouse: Throw card when a card is prepared

This is a prototype made for a game jam that still lacks a lot of content. Feedback and ideas are still welcome tho!
